author: wtopstaff
title: Hurricanes-Sharks Sum
text:
2 1—5 
First Period_1, San Jose, J.Ward 3 (Marleau, Hertl), 1:21. 2, San Jose, J.Ward 4 (Burns), 8:32. 
Second Period_3, Carolina, Faulk 3 (Gerbe, Rask), 3:09 (pp). 4, San Jose, Pavelski 3 (Vlasic, Thornton), 6:08. 5, San Jose, Wingels 1 (Tierney, Martin), 9:09. 6, Carolina, Nash 1 (Hanifin, Versteeg), 10:43. 
Third Period_7, San Jose, J.Ward 5 (Burns), 19:03 (en). 
Shots on Goal_Carolina 7-12-15_34. San Jose 6-8-7_21. 
Goalies_Carolina, Lack, C.Ward. San Jose, Jones. A_15,814 (17,562). T_2:24. Topics:
